text: When I was informed that a plot 23:30 was about to be executed against this man by the Jews 86.2% ¦ would be executed against this man CT 3.1%was about to be executed against this man by the Jews, I sent him to yoʋ at once, also ordering his accusers to state before yoʋ the charges against him. 23:30 Farewell. ¦ --- ECM† NA SBL WHFarewell.”
